# scale

**Instance Property**

The specular value for the entire entity or a multiplier for values sampled from the material’s texture.

## Declaration

```swift
var scale: Float
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Specular-swift.struct/texture] is `nil`, RealityKit uses this value for the opacity of the entire material. If [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Specular-swift.struct/texture] isn’t `nil`, RealityKit multiplies the value sampled from [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Specular-swift.struct/texture] by this property to calculate the final opacity values.

## Accessing specular values

- **texture**: The specular value as a UV-mapped image texture.
